description: Update an auto scaling configuration to be the default. The existing default auto scaling configuration will be set to non-default automatically.

parameters.name: AutoScalingConfigurationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App Runner auto scaling configuration that you want to set as the default. The ARN can be a full auto scaling configuration ARN, or a partial ARN ending with either .../name or ``--¦/name/revision ``. If a revision isn't specified, the latest active revision is set as the default.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingConfiguration
nested_items.description: A description of the App Runner auto scaling configuration that was set as default.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this auto scaling configuration.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingConfigurationName
nested_items.description: The customer-provided auto scaling configuration name. It can be used in multiple revisions of a configuration.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingConfigurationRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of this auto scaling configuration. It's unique among all the active configurations ( "Status": "ACTIVE") that share the same AutoScalingConfigurationName.

nested_items.name: Latest
nested_items.description: It's set to true for the configuration with the highest Revision among all configurations that share the same AutoScalingConfigurationName. It's set to false otherwise.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current state of the auto scaling configuration. If the status of a configuration revision is INACTIVE, it was deleted and can't be used. Inactive configuration revisions are permanently removed some time after they are deleted.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests that an instance processes. If the number of concurrent requests exceeds this limit, App Runner scales the service up.

nested_items.name: MinSize
nested_items.description: The minimum number of instances that App Runner provisions for a service. The service always has at least MinSize provisioned instances. Some of them actively serve traffic. The rest of them (provisioned and inactive instances) are a cost-effective compute capacity reserve and are ready to be quickly activated. You pay for memory usage of all the provisioned instances. You pay for CPU usage of only the active subset.

nested_items.name: MaxSize
nested_items.description: The maximum number of instances that a service scales up to. At most MaxSize instances actively serve traffic for your service.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the auto scaling configuration was created. It's in Unix time stamp format.

nested_items.name: DeletedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the auto scaling configuration was deleted. It's in Unix time stamp format.

nested_items.name: HasAssociatedService
nested_items.description: Indicates if this auto scaling configuration has an App Runner service associated with it. A value of true indicates one or more services are associated. A value of false indicates no services are associated.

nested_items.name: IsDefault
nested_items.description: Indicates if this auto scaling configuration should be used as the default for a new App Runner service that does not have an auto scaling configuration ARN specified during creation. Each account can have only one default AutoScalingConfiguration per region. The default AutoScalingConfiguration can be any revision under the same AutoScalingConfigurationName.
